meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>sound</kanji> that <kanji>departs</kanji> from your mouth is you talking. Imagine yourself saying things and words departing your mouth. They are bent in different ways and have different colors, highlighting your <vocabulary>pronunciation</vocabulary> of certain words and phrases.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
